database.name: VIEW SCO_LOAN_DOC_PAYDETAIL_V
database.view: SELECT t.sco_loan_doc_id || t.fin_payment_id AS sco_loan_doc_paydetail_v_id, t.sco_loan_doc_id, p2.fin_payment_id, p2.ad_client_id, p2.ad_org_id, p2.isactive, p2.created, p2.createdby, p2.updated, p2.updatedby, p2.amount, p2.paymentdate, p2.documentno, p2.referenceno, p2.status, p2.fin_financial_account_id, p2.em_sco_alt_convert_rate AS sco_alt_convert_rate, p2.description FROM (SELECT ld.sco_loan_doc_id, p.fin_payment_id FROM sco_loan_doc ld JOIN c_invoice i ON ld.c_invoice_id = i.c_invoice_id JOIN fin_payment_schedule ps ON ps.c_invoice_id = i.c_invoice_id JOIN fin_payment_scheduledetail psd ON psd.fin_payment_schedule_invoice = ps.fin_payment_schedule_id JOIN fin_payment_detail pd ON pd.fin_payment_detail_id = psd.fin_payment_detail_id JOIN fin_payment p ON p.fin_payment_id = pd.fin_payment_id GROUP BY ld.sco_loan_doc_id, p.fin_payment_id) t JOIN fin_payment p2 ON p2.fin_payment_id = t.fin_payment_id
